newsitem.title: FRANCE: EU's de Silguy - private, official ecu to converge.
newsitem.headline: EU's de Silguy - private, official ecu to converge.

text.p: Interest rates on the private ecu should converge with those on the offical ecu before the launch of European monetary union in 1999, European Commissioner Yves-Thibault de Silguy said on Thursday.
"At the present moment, we are seeing rates on the private ecu coming closer to rates on the official ecu," he said in an interview on French television.
"Before the move to the euro, you will have a merging of rates on the private ecu and the official ecu because expectations are going in that direction," he said.
